name: Sold Out
overview: Sold Out is a game in which the player takes the role of a music manager that first have to choose between a main voice character (there are 5 different to choose each of them with different styles: rock, pop, soul, etc). After that the player have to cruise the city searching for other members for the band (he will need a bass player, a guitar player and a drummer) in places like a music study, bars, coffee places, parks or music & musical instruments stores. When he got all the members of the band he have to find a composer that sells him songs to record it (when he got enough he can make a complete cd) and them start a gig with the band: First they can only play in small places but later in better places. The player can also hire new possible members to the band, and change the band members. He can also promote the band gigs, but new items for the band place, reheard the songs, talk to the members of the band, etc. The player can also check each week the different chart positions of his band.
